EnhancedContent:
I tried to disable it on msconfig & i even tried this: bcdedit /set {bootmgr} displaybootmenu yes

But it still returns at startup ... .
Title: A way to get rid of Desktop.ini from Desktop folder in win11.
Description:
I tried to disable it on msconfig & i even tried this: bcdedit /set {bootmgr} displaybootmenu yes

But it still returns at startup ... .

![]()
Author: RasBaraka
